item.title: CKS/CKA tips
item.description: the fastest way to get nodes Many times, I run "kubectl get nodes" to get nodes I need to connect to make changes. In the question description section of tasks, master nodes and worker nodes are given. I think the fastest way to get nodes and I wasted some time on getting that info from commands. quickly get vulnerabilitiy info of images using trivy cat <<EOF | xargs -I{} sh -c 'trivy -q image {} | grep -B2 -E "Total:"' nginx:1.
